page.title: 20Authors & Acknowledgements
page.content: {These pages were researched,compiled {and edited by: The pupils of the following schools - Gleadless Valley Comprehensive; Hemsworth,Herdings & Basegreen Juniors The following teachers - Norman Hobson,Bill Jamieson,Vic Lally,Ian Russell, and Roger Unwin. {We would like to thank:} Youth Club Leader Dave Taylor, Vicar Rev.Moore, Mr.Richard Caborn,M.P., The local police especially P.C s Marsh and Whittaker, The Library Service, The Community Association, Finally we offer our thanks to many other local people,too numerous to mention by name, for their help and cooperation in the compilation of this data.
